description: Ultrasoft stretch cotton and a relaxed fit make these shorts a comfortable classic you'll reach for again and again.
fitting_details: Stretch Classic Fit: sits at the waist. Eased through the leg.
All Big sizes have a 9½" inseam. All Tall sizes have a 10½" inseam. Size 46W has a 12½" rise.
Belt loops. Zip fly with a buttoned closure.
Two front angled pockets. Right hip coin pocket. Back left buttoned pocket. Back right button-and-loop pocket.
Signature embroidered pony above the back right pocket.
Due to the natural characteristics of this material, the coloring may rub off onto fabrics and upholstery.
